mapper.insert: insert into annuitySavingBase (annuitySavingID, dclsMonth, comNum, prdNum, comName, prdName, pnsnKindName, saleStart, prdtTypeName, avgPrftRate, dclsRate, guarRate, btrmPrftRate1, btrmPrftRate2, btrmPrftRate3, saleCom, dclsStart) values (#{annuitySavingID}, #{dclsMonth}, #{comNum}, #{prdNum}, #{comName}, #{prdName}, #{pnsnKindName}, #{saleStart}, #{prdtTypeName}, #{avgPrftRate}, #{dclsRate}, #{guarRate}, #{btrmPrftRate1}, #{btrmPrftRate2}, #{btrmPrftRate3}, #{saleCom}, #{dclsStart})

insert into annuitySavingOption (annuitySavingID, dclsMonth, comNum, prdNum, pnsnRecTrm, pnsnEnterAge, monPay, payPeriod, pnsnStartAge, pnsnRecAmt) values (#{annuitySavingID}, #{dclsMonth}, #{comNum}, #{prdNum}, #{pnsnRecTrm}, #{pnsnEnterAge}, #{monPay}, #{payPeriod}, #{pnsnStartAge}, #{pnsnRecAmt})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM annuitySavingBase as b inner join annuitySavingOption as o on b.annuitySavingID = o.annuitySavingID

SELECT * FROM annuitySavingBase as b inner join annuitySavingOption as o on b.annuitySavingID = o.annuitySavingID WHERE comName like CONCAT('%', #{prdName}, '%') and prdtTypeName like CONCAT('%', #{prdtTypeName}, '%') and pnsnKindName like CONCAT('%', #{pnsnKindName}, '%')

SELECT b.comName, b.prdName, pnsnKindName, saleStart, prdtTypeName, avgPrftRate, dclsRate, guarRate, btrmPrftRate1, btrmPrftRate2, btrmPrftRate3, saleCom, pnsnRecTrm, pnsnEnterAge, monPay, payPeriod, pnsnStartAge, pnsnRecAmt FROM annuitySavingBase b, annuitySavingOption o where b.annuitySavingID = o.annuitySavingID AND b.annuitySavingID = #{annuitySavingID}

SELECT b.comName, b.prdName, pnsnKindName, saleStart, prdtTypeName, avgPrftRate, dclsRate, guarRate, btrmPrftRate1, btrmPrftRate2, btrmPrftRate3, saleCom, pnsnRecTrm, pnsnEnterAge, monPay, payPeriod, pnsnStartAge, pnsnRecAmt FROM annuitySavingBase b, annuitySavingOption o where b.annuitySavingID = o.annuitySavingID AND b.annuitySavingID = #{annuitySavingID}
